metadata.title: Monthly and Annual Types and Boundaries of River and Sea Ice for the Northern Hemisphere
metadata.description: To provide the mariners with a summation of data concerning a serious and ever present menace to navigation.  This publication is in the National Climatic Data Center's Foreign Data Library, and is one of many books, atlases, maps, charts and other printed materials received by the NCDC from many nations over the years.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide the mariners with a summation of data concerning a serious and ever present menace to navigation.  This publication is in the National Climatic Data Center's Foreign Data Library, and is one of many books, atlases, maps, charts and other printed materials received by the NCDC from many nations over the years.
